statements: SELECT * FROM customer_payments;
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM customer_payments;
SELECT payment_amount, card_number FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, card_number, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE card_expiry > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, card_number, card_expiry, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, card_number, cvv, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE cvv IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%' AND payment_amount < 500.00;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payment ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM payment WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM customer JOIN payment ON customer.customer_id = payment.customer_id WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' OR phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT method_type, method_details FROM payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_email ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customers.customer_name, payment_methods.method_type FROM customers INNER JOIN payment_methods ON customers.customer_id = payment_methods.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_name, card_number FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, card_expiry_date FROM customer_details WHERE card_expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, method_name FROM customer_details JOIN customer_payment_methods ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_payment_methods.customer_id JOIN payment_methods ON customer_payment_methods.method_id = payment_methods.method_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, card_number FROM customer_details JOIN customer_payment_methods ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_payment_methods.customer_id WHERE method_id = 1;

SELECT customer_name, method_name FROM customer_details JOIN customer_payment_methods ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_payment_methods.customer_id JOIN payment_methods ON customer_payment_methods.method_id = payment_methods.method_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number, expiry_date FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_type, payment_account FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number, expiry_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT pm.payment_type, ba.address_line1, ba.city FROM payment_methods pm JOIN billing_addresses ba ON pm.customer_id = ba.customer_id;
